com.tomscz.afrest.marshal

Class ModelInspector

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tomscz.afrest.marshal.ModelInspector

  • public class ModelInspector
extends java.lang.Object
    This class use AspectFaces to generate context which could be used to create rest definition of this data. It use DEFAULT_LAYOUT DEFAULT_MAPPING and DEFAULT_CLASS_LAYOUT files to inspect. If you want use another files, then use proper method to generate.
    Since:
    1.0.0.
    Author:
    Martin Tomasek (martin@toms-cz.com)

    • Method Detail

      • generateModel

        public AFMetaModelPack generateModel(java.lang.String fullClassName,
                            java.lang.String templateMapping,
                            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> classStructureMapping,
                            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> classTemplateMapping)
                              throws MetamodelException
        This method generate model which can be used to create form, widget and etc. Key is name of field and value is name of xml file
        Parameters:
        fullClassName - className to generate
        templateMapping - template mapping, layout which will be used to root entity
        classStructureMapping - this set structure which will be used based on field.
        classTemplateMapping - this set layout which will be used based on field.
        Returns:
        model which can be used to create form, tables, etc.
        Throws:
        MetamodelException - if error during generation module occur then this exception is thrown.

      • generateModel

        public AFMetaModelPack generateModel(java.lang.String fullClassName,
                            java.lang.String structureMapping,
                            java.lang.String templateMapping,
                            java.lang.String templateInnerClass)
                              throws MetamodelException
        This method generate model which can be used to create form, widget and etc. Key is name of field and value is name of xml file
        Parameters:
        fullClassName - className to generate
        structureMapping - structure which will be used.
        templateMapping - layout (template) which will be used on root element
        templateInnerClass - layout (template) which will be used on non-primitive root children
        Returns:
        model which can be used to create form, tables, etc.
        Throws:
        MetamodelException - if error during generation module occur then this exception is thrown.

      • generateModel

        public AFMetaModelPack generateModel(java.lang.String fullClassName)
                              throws MetamodelException
        This method generate model which can be used to create form, widget and etc. Key is name of field and value is name of xml file.
        Parameters:
        fullClassName - className to generate
        Returns:
        model which can be used to create form, tables, etc.
        Throws:
        MetamodelException - if error during generation module occur then this exception is thrown.

      • generate

        private java.lang.String generate(java.lang.String fullClassName,
                        java.lang.String layout,
                        java.lang.String structure)
                           throws MetamodelException
        This method generate inspect class and generate widget based on template and mapping in parameter.
        Parameters:
        fullClassName -
        layout - which will be used its XML file name
        structure - which will be used. its XML file name
        Returns:
        fully inspected class based on structure and layout
        Throws:
        MetamodelException - if during inspection occur error.

      • getMapping

        private java.lang.String getMapping(java.lang.String fieldName)
        This method return structure which will be used based on fieldName
        Parameters:
        fieldName - which will determine which structure will be used.
        Returns:
        structure name as XML file which will be used based on fieldName

      • getLayout

        private java.lang.String getLayout(java.lang.String fieldName,
                         boolean isRoot)
        This method return layout which will be used based on fieldName and variable isRoot. This variable (isRoot) determine if this is first inspection of root class, hence you want to use specific layout for this
        Parameters:
        fieldName - which will determine which layout will be used.
        isRoot -
        Returns:
        layout name as XML file which will be used based on fieldName
